questions.question_text:
An administrator is performing a scripted installation of ESXi 6.x.
In which three locations does the script need to be? (Choose three.)

choices.C: Select the Sync subscribed library option
choices.B: Select the Download all library content immediately option

questions.question_text:
A vApp template recently added to a Content Library is not displayed.
Which two actions could correct this problem? (Choose two.)
What are three goals of resource management within a cluster? (Choose three.)

choices.A: To prevent virtual machines from monopolizing resources and to guarantee predictable service rates.
choices.C: To provide solutions to potential problems that you might encounter when using vCenter Server.
choices.E: To provide additional network administration capabilities.
choices.B: To exploit undercommitted resources and overcommit with graceful degradation.
choices.D: To control the relative importance of virtual machines and provide flexible dynamic partitioning.

questions.question_text: Which load balancing policy, previously limited to vSphere Distributed Switches, is now available on vSphere Standard Switches with vSphere 6.x?

choices.C: Route based on the originating virtual port
choices.A: Route based on physical NIC workload
choices.D: Route based on Source MAC Hash

discussion.content:
This is incorrect. Route based on physical NIC is only available for distributed port groups or distributed ports.
Reference: https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/6.0/com.vmware.vsphere.networking.doc/GUID-D34B1ADD-B8A7-43CD-AA7E-2832A0F7EE76.html

questions.answer_description: Compare both standard and distributed switch in the 5.1 version documentation (first link) to the 6.0 version documentation (second link) below: https://pubs.vmware.com/vsphere-51/index.jsp?topic=%2Fcom.vmware.vsphere.networking.doc%2FGUID-D5EA6315-5DCD-463E-A701-B3D8D9250FB5.html https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-vSphere/6.0/com.vmware.vsphere.networking.doc/GUID-D34B1ADD-B8A7-43CD-AA7E-2832A0F7EE76.html

questions.question_text: Which is the VDP appliance available storage configuration maximum?
